DATA ANALYTICS

MARKETING ANALYTICS

Analyze, Visualize and make decisions using Complex Multi-Channel Marketing Data. Our Analytics and visualization solution helps in
  1. Customer Targeting
  2. Conversion
  3. Marketing budget allocation between Channels
  4. Cost Optimization
  5. Increase profitability and ROI

RISK ANALYTICS

Measure, quantify, and predict financial risk using data from multiple sources. Our Analytics and visualization solutions can help your organization in the following areas of risk management
  1. Credit or Defualt risk
  2. Systematic risk
  3. Unsystematic risk
  4. Market risk

CUSTOMER ANALYTICS

Analyze, understand and make business decisions using customer behavior data. Our Analytics and visualization solutions can help in the following areas
  1. Understand customer habits and buying behavior
  2. Customer retention and Loyalty programs
  3. Cross selling products to existing customers
  4. Targeted communication for different customer behavior segments

OPERATIONS ANALYTICS

Our Analytics and visualization solutions can help in the improving operational efficiency in the following areas
  1. Process improvement
  2. Inventory and supply chain improvement
  3. Customer service
